custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId WHERE (CAST_TEXT(DLFileEntry.extraSettings) != '') OR (CAST_TEXT(DLFileVersion.extraSettings) != '')
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry [$JOIN$] WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT COUNT(DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) AND (DLFileVersion.version = DLFileEntry.version)
WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileEntry.modifiedDate >= ?) AND (DLFileEntry.modifiedDate <= ?) AND (DLFileEntry.repositoryId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId WHERE (DLFileVersion.groupId = ?) AND ( (DLFileEntry.userId = ?) OR (DLFileVersion.userId = ?) ) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileVersion.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileVersion WHERE (DLFileVersion.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId WHERE (DLFileVersion.companyId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON TEMP_TABLE.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ( DLFileEntry.fileEntryTypeId IN ( SELECT DDMStructureLink.classPK FROM DDMStructureLink WHERE [$DDM_STRUCTURE_ID$] ) )
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry LEFT JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?) AND (AssetEntry.classPK = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) WHERE AssetEntry.classPK IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId WHERE (CAST_TEXT(DLFileEntry.extraSettings) != '') OR (CAST_TEXT(DLFileVersion.extraSettings) != '') ORDER BY DLFileEntry.modifiedDate DESC
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry LEFT JOIN Group_ ON Group_.groupId = DLFileEntry.groupId WHERE Group_.groupId IS NULL

SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId FROM DLFileEntry [$JOIN$] WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_ID$] ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON TEMP_TABLE.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN AssetEntry ON AssetEntry.classPK = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId WHERE (DLFileEntry.treePath LIKE ?) AND (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?)

SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId WHERE (DLFileVersion.groupId = ?) AND ( (DLFileEntry.userId = ?) OR (DLFileVersion.userId = ?) ) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_ID$] ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON TEMP_TABLE.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId

SELECT {DLFileEntryMetadata.*} FROM DLFileEntryMetadata LEFT JOIN DLFileEntry ON DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileEntryMetadata.fileEntryId LEFT JOIN DDMStructure ON DDMStructure.structureId = DLFileEntryMetadata.DDMStructureId WHERE DDMStructure.companyId != DLFileEntry.companyId

SELECT {DLFileEntryMetadata.*} FROM DLFileEntryMetadata LEFT JOIN DLFileEntry ON DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileEntryMetadata.fileEntryId LEFT JOIN DDMStructure ON DDMStructure.structureId = DLFileEntryMetadata.DDMStructureId WHERE DDMStructure.structureId IS NULL

[$BASIC_DOCUMENT$] SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fileEntryTypeId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntryType WHERE (DLFileEntryType.companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (LOWER(DLFileEntryType.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DLFileEntryType.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

[$BASIC_DOCUMENT$] SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fileEntryTypeId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntryType INNER JOIN DLFileEntryTypes_DLFolders ON DLFileEntryTypes_DLFolders.fileEntryTypeId = DLFileEntryType.fileEntryTypeId WHERE (DLFileEntryType.companyId = ?) AND (DLFileEntryTypes_DLFolders.folderId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (LOWER(DLFileEntryType.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DLFileEntryType.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

[$BASIC_DOCUMENT$] SELECT DISTINCT {DLFileEntryType.*} FROM DLFileEntryType WHERE (DLFileEntryType.companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (LOWER(DLFileEntryType.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DLFileEntryType.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

[$BASIC_DOCUMENT$] SELECT DISTINCT {DLFileEntryType.*} FROM DLFileEntryType INNER JOIN DLFileEntryTypes_DLFolders ON DLFileEntryTypes_DLFolders.fileEntryTypeId = DLFileEntryType.fileEntryTypeId WHERE (DLFileEntryType.companyId = ?) AND (DLFileEntryTypes_DLFolders.folderId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (LOWER(DLFileEntryType.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DLFileEntryType.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )
SELECT groupId, userId FROM DLFileRank GROUP BY groupId, userId HAVING COUNT(*) > ?
SELECT {DLFileRank.*} FROM DLFileRank INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileRank.fileEntryId WHERE DLFileEntry.folderId = ?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT folderId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFolder WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND ([$HIDDEN$]) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileVersion.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileVersion WHERE (DLFileVersion.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$OWNER_USER_ID$]) AND [$FILE_VERSION_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileVersion.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileVersion WHERE (DLFileVersion.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$OWNER_USER_ID$]) AND [$FILE_VERSION_FOLDER_ID$] AND (DLFileVersion.fileEntryTypeId = ?)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fileShortcutId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileShortcut [$JOIN$] WHERE (DLFileShortcut.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileShortcut.active_ = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT {DLFolder.*} FROM DLFolder LEFT JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?) AND (AssetEntry.classPK = DLFolder.folderId) WHERE AssetEntry.classPK IS NULL
SELECT {DLFolder.*} FROM DLFolder INNER JOIN AssetEntry ON AssetEntry.classPK = DLFolder.folderId WHERE (DLFolder.treePath LIKE ?) AND (AssetEntry.classNameId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFolder.createDate AS createDate, DLFolder.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, DLFolder.name AS name, DLFolder.name AS title, 0 AS size_, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 1 AS modelFolder, 0 AS readCount FROM DLFolder WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND ([$HIDDEN$]) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate AS createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder, 0 AS readCount FROM DLFileEntry [$JOIN$] WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$OWNER_USER_ID$]) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate AS createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder, ViewCountEntry.viewCount AS readCount FROM ViewCountEntry [$VC_JOIN$] INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.companyId = ViewCountEntry.companyId) AND (ViewCountEntry.classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$]) AND (DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = ViewCountEntry.classPK) WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$OWNER_USER_ID$]) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] UNION ALL SELECT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate AS createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder, 0 AS readCount FROM DLFileEntry [$JOIN$] LEFT JOIN ViewCountEntry ON (DLFileEntry.companyId = ViewCountEntry.companyId) AND (ViewCountEntry.classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$]) AND (DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = ViewCountEntry.classPK) WHERE (ViewCountEntry.viewCount IS NULL) AND (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$OWNER_USER_ID$]) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate AS createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder, 0 AS readCount FROM DLFileEntry [$JOIN$] WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$OWNER_USER_ID$]) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] AND (DLFileEntry.fileEntryTypeId = ?)

SELECT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate AS createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder, ViewCountEntry.viewCount AS readCount FROM ViewCountEntry [$VC_JOIN$] INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.companyId = ViewCountEntry.companyId) AND (ViewCountEntry.classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$]) AND (DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = ViewCountEntry.classPK) WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$OWNER_USER_ID$]) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] AND (DLFileEntry.fileEntryTypeId = ?) UNION ALL SELECT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate AS createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder, 0 AS readCount FROM DLFileEntry [$JOIN$] LEFT JOIN ViewCountEntry ON (DLFileEntry.companyId = ViewCountEntry.companyId) AND (ViewCountEntry.classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$]) AND (DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = ViewCountEntry.classPK) WHERE (ViewCountEntry.viewCount IS NULL) AND (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$OWNER_USER_ID$]) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] AND (DLFileEntry.fileEntryTypeId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate AS createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, fileShortcutId AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder, 0 AS readCount FROM DLFileShortcut INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileShortcut.toFileEntryId WHERE (DLFileShortcut.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileShortcut.active_ = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate AS createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, fileShortcutId AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder, ViewCountEntry.viewCount AS readCount FROM DLFileShortcut INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileShortcut.toFileEntryId INNER JOIN ViewCountEntry ON (DLFileEntry.companyId = ViewCountEntry.companyId) AND (ViewCountEntry.classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$]) AND (DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = ViewCountEntry.classPK) WHERE (DLFileShortcut.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileShortcut.active_ = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] UNION ALL SELECT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate AS createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, fileShortcutId AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder, 0 AS readCount FROM DLFileShortcut INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileShortcut.toFileEntryId LEFT JOIN ViewCountEntry ON (DLFileEntry.companyId = ViewCountEntry.companyId) AND (ViewCountEntry.classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$]) AND (DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = ViewCountEntry.classPK) WHERE (ViewCountEntry.viewCount IS NULL) AND (DLFileShortcut.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileShortcut.active_ = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$]
INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileVersion.fileEntryId
INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileShortcut.toFileEntryId

INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.companyId = ViewCountEntry.companyId) AND (ViewCountEntry.classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$]) AND (ViewCountEntry.classPK = DLFileVersion.fileEntryId)
